original_text: Then Michaiah declared unto them all the words that he had heard, when Baruch read the book in the ears of the people.
korean_text: 미가야가 바룩이 백성의 귀에 책을 낭독할 때에 들은 모든 말을 그들에게 전하매

sentences.original_text: Then Michaiah declared unto them all the words
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 미가야는 그들에게 모든 말을 선포했으니

sentences.original_text: in the ears of the people
